member.name: D3D11_TEX2D_ARRAY_RTV1
member.summary: Describes the subresources from an array of 2D textures to use in a render-target view.

member.name: D3D11_TEX2D_ARRAY_RTV1.MipSlice
member.summary: The index of the mipmap level to use mip slice.

member.name: D3D11_TEX2D_ARRAY_RTV1.FirstArraySlice
member.summary: The index of the first texture to use in an array of textures.

member.name: D3D11_TEX2D_ARRAY_RTV1.ArraySize
member.summary: Number of textures in the array to use in the render-target view, starting from FirstArraySlice.

member.name: D3D11_TEX2D_ARRAY_RTV1.PlaneSlice
member.summary: The index (plane slice number) of the plane to use in an array of textures.
